name: proficiently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows skill and experience: We aim to get all children reading proficiently. There are about 195,000 workers who don't speak English proficiently.
More examplesFewer examplesThe company's reps answered our calls quickly and proficiently.The dancers moved proficiently, if not precisely.There are books that I don't like, but I can see they are proficiently written.
